content.question: In The Saint-Lazare Station, Claude Monet chose a railway station as his subject, consistent with the Impressionists’ interest in

choices.label: elevating representations of labor to the status of history painting
observing the environment of day-to-day urban life
mechanical reproduction as a key feature of modern painting
equating the commercialization of travel with painting’s commodification

content.answer: observing the environment of day-to-day urban life

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.D: Explain the meaning or significance of continuity and/or change between works of art (or groups of related works of art) within a related artistic tradition, style, or practice.
